channel.title: New local problems on FixMyStreet
channel.description: The latest local problems reported by users

item.title: Recreation ground repairs, 7th January
item.description:
During electrical work in the park the grass has been churned up when contractors have carried out the work in the recreation ground, if this could be raised to be looked at. JW
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Gresham Road, Elmers End, Greater London

item.title: Blue toyota pruis car dumped on brook street, 7th January
item.description:
Car has been there since sunday/monday, looks as though its been involved in an accident as the front of it is hanging off. The number plates have been taken off and police have been told about this but keep advising people to call us. This is also half on the pavement and is blocking access and residents are concerned it may cause more accidents as its positioned in an awkward place.
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): 283, Brook Street, Northumberland Heath, Greater London
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Beside the bus stop 214/88, 7th January
item.description:
There is clearly a leak beneath the pavement - constant large puddles in a straight line from each other. Has been there since the summer. Hazard at present as frozen
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): 37-61, Highgate Road, Dartmouth Park, Greater London
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Street is filthy and full of rubbish, 7th January
item.description:
The whole street is filthy. So many black bags, broken glass, food waste (bags have been torn open)… it’s disgusting. And it keeps being added to.
Nearest address to the pin placed on the map (from OS Places API): Edge Hill, Woolwich
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Orange graffiti on bus timings, 7th January
item.description:
Please clean off tag

item.category: Graffiti / Flyposting on stop or shelter (non-offensive)

item.title: Dumped Christmas tree, 7th January
item.description:
This is an continuing problem. Someone is ALWAYS dumping something in the location above. Frequently gas cannisters, furniture & black bags of rubbish. I live at no 9 & am always putting what I can in my bin or reporting larger items. Also someone is repeatedly putting items into my bins, always the wrong things in wrong bins, resulting in my green bin not being emptied last week & me recieving a letter. ITS NOT ME !! We seriously need CCTV on the corner to identify the culprits.

Nearest address to the pin placed on the map (from OS Places API): Stane Way, Woolwich
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Bins not fully emptied, 7th January
item.description:
After submitted a report a few days ago that our bins hadn’t been emptied in weeks (incl the food waste and recycling bins), the bins were finally emptied yesterday. However, the recycling bins have still not been empty and rubbish was left everywhere

Nearest address to the pin placed on the map (from OS Places API): Barretts Grove, Hackney, London
Report on FixMyStreet
